casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Spaulding, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al.; Kroger Company, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Spaulding v. Indus. Comm, (2001), 93 Ohio St.3d 653.]

(No. 01-817 Submitted November 13, 2001 Decided December 19, 2001.) Robert A. Muehleisen, for appellee. Porter, Wright, Morris & Arthur and Karl J. Sutter, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J;, Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
